official_title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel ROYAL STAR for employment in the Great Lakes coastwise and fisheries trades.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade and fisheries.

titles.title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel ROYAL STAR for employment in the Great Lakes coastwise and fisheries trades.
